name: webdev-final-project
description: Overall package for the webdev final project

scripts.neural: python3  utils/training.py 5  &&  mv -f MNIST_trained tfjsmodel public/saved
scripts.neural3: python3  utils/training.py 3  &&  mv -f MNIST_trained tfjsmodel public/saved
scripts.neural5: python3  utils/training.py 5  &&  mv -f MNIST_trained tfjsmodel public/saved
scripts.neural10: python3  utils/training.py 10 &&  mv -f MNIST_trained tfjsmodel public/saved
scripts.build: npm install && rm -r -f public/saved; mkdir public/saved; pip3 install --user tensorflow tensorflowjs && npm run neural

author: Nicholas Olson, Pierre Carr
